name: Win Condition
_source: s;Mercenary1;Scatter! They can't get all of us!
s;Simon;With that taken care of, who are you?
s;Nika;The name's Nika. Captain and ex-prisoner, it seems.
s;Simon;Captain? Which house do you serve?
s;Nika;I was a levee of House Morrissey.|Hah, if they're still around.
s;Nika;What about you? Some merchant or noble?
s;Simon;Something like that.{w}{br}Call me Simon.{w}{br}I'm just someone interested in restoring some order.
s;Nika;If you're really interested in order, these caverns continue.{w}{br}The guards even mentioned rumors of a dragon dwelling there.
s;Simon;If true, that's a huge threat to the area.{w}{br}Might be a bit too dangerous at the moment, though.
s;Nika;Anyway, I might tag along with your group.{w}{br}Just, uh, let me stop by the village first.
s;Nika;I just want to make sure they're all okay...
s;Nika;Argh, why won't the voices stop?{w}{br}The temple... it's always that damned temple.
